description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires all labour, materials, equipment, transportation and daily site supervision necessary to provide janitorial services in accordance with the Invitation to Tender and Annex \
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
==========================

**Janitorial Services for RCMP Stonewall Detachment**
---------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** cb-37-23986679

**Solicitation Number:** M5000-24-0558/A

**Publication Date:** 2024-02-13

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-14T16:00:00

**Status:** Cancelled

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking bids for janitorial services at the RCMP Stonewall Detachment in Stonewall, Manitoba. The contract will require daily site supervision, materials, equipment, transportation, and labor for janitorial services, three (3) times a week.

**contract period:**

The contract will be for two (2) years, with an option to extend it for up to three (3) additional one-year periods.

**Security and Site Visit:**

This solicitation contains a security requirement, and a site visit will be offered. Bidders should refer to the attached tender documents for additional details.

**Tender Requirements:**

  *   Bidders must comply with all requirements of the tender solicitation to be declared responsive.
  *   Responsive bidders are encouraged to submit a bid in English or French.

  *   The RCMP has implemented the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.

**Indigenous Procurement:**

Bidders may register with the Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) to increase their visibility and compete for federal government contracts that are set-aside for Indigenous businesses through the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses.

**Electronic Tendering:**

The tender opportunity, bid solicitation, and related documents are available for download on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

Note: Please see the attached tender documents and attached RFP document for further details.
